combat.description: Lifeforms suddenly appear on your scanners. A ship hid itself on a nearby asteroid and is now speeding towards you. Prepare for combat!

boost.description: You find yourself at a small port and a local benefactor offers to repair your ship. Your weapons have been healed for 20 health!

choice.description: You identify a criminal ship holding valuable resources leaving a nearby planet. You can chase after them or stop by the planet to recover.

reward.description: As you scanned the surrounding debris field, you identified a crate displaying strange gravitational pull. You find it contains some valuable compressed resources.
